Articles.Content:
Greetings fellow Kerbonauts!

I'm Mirgo, and I'm new to these forums. I've been playing KSP since version 0.16, but never got around to registering on the forums...until now!

I thought it would be fun to attempt some of the challenges (perhaps create some of my own), and share some of my spacecraft with other KSP players.

Besides KSP, I also play EVE Online, and I bet some of you out there probably play it as well and I've lately been playing X3: Albion Prelude, since it was on sale for $10 on Steam.

So anyways, see you around!

- Mirgo
Looking forward to sharing them! Currently I'm attempting to build a VTOL SSTO spaceplane, but so far I've had issues with balancing. But I think I'll have a breakthrough soon
